flow.descriptionCdata:
9a92a4f8-3577-4dc7-9847-18da0951fccf.11d556c4-0a81-4572-853a-e32091aa55c5.description=
Operation to check for null or empty string local variables.

Inputs\:

inputList\:  comma seperated list of variables to check

Reponsses\:
hasNull\:  at least one variable is null or has an empy string for a value
noNulls\:  all variables have a value

Result\:  List of variables that are null or empty strings
9a92a4f8-3577-4dc7-9847-18da0951fccf.33178150-0ccf-42d6-95d8-645daba8cfda.description=
Sleeps for "X" seconds.

Inputs\:
seconds - The number of seconds to sleep.

Responses\:
success - Slept for "X" seconds.
failure - was unable to sleep for some reason
9a92a4f8-3577-4dc7-9847-18da0951fccf.42c9867e-c03f-4e0d-8507-4b684f92fae3.description=
Appends a flow variable in the local context.

Input Parameters\:
varName - the name of the flow variable to use
valueToAppend - value to append

Responses\:
success - assigned the flow variable
9a92a4f8-3577-4dc7-9847-18da0951fccf.50d5c322-fe85-4648-9f70-3dbcc4d6266c.description=
Appends a flow variable in the local context.

Input Parameters\:
varName - the name of the flow variable to use
valueToAppend - value to append

Responses\:
success - assigned the flow variable
9a92a4f8-3577-4dc7-9847-18da0951fccf.5dac8d16-6719-4f76-acb3-1128fa2495fd.description=
Tries to make a connection to the request port.

Input Parameters\:
host - hostname or IP address of the target host
port - port to connect to
portType - the type of port (TCP or UDP) 

Responses\:
port opened - a successful connection was made
port closed - unable to make a connection
host not found - could not resolve hostname to a valid IP address

Extra Results\:
addresses - list of addresses returned from DNS
aliases - list of aliases returned from DNS
addresspinged - actual IP address pinged
9a92a4f8-3577-4dc7-9847-18da0951fccf.783fb279-ad27-4dad-baec-c11a85c3f6e3.description=
Sleeps for "X" seconds.

Inputs\:
seconds - The number of seconds to sleep.

Responses\:
success - Slept for "X" seconds.
failure - was unable to sleep for some reason
9a92a4f8-3577-4dc7-9847-18da0951fccf.8298f962-00af-490a-8638-b1bdb03ff652.description=
Appends a flow variable in the local context.

Input Parameters\:
varName - the name of the flow variable to use
valueToAppend - value to append

Responses\:
success - assigned the flow variable
9a92a4f8-3577-4dc7-9847-18da0951fccf.8fec4993-8f1e-4d41-a078-4853e254888b.description=
Appends a flow variable in the local context.

Input Parameters\:
varName - the name of the flow variable to use
valueToAppend - value to append

Responses\:
success - assigned the flow variable
9a92a4f8-3577-4dc7-9847-18da0951fccf.d645bbea-2252-40b2-aafd-f6736f0d4e01.description=
Counts from one number to another number.

Inputs\:
from - The number to start counting at
to - The number to count to
incrementBy - The amount to increment by during each count.
reset - If set to true, then the counter will restart counting from the beginning.

Responses\:
has more - Not yet done counting.
failure - Something went wrong.
no more - Done counting. This will only be returned once, then counting restarts.

Returns\:
The number that was just counted.
flow.name: checkIpPortConnect

staticBinding.value: CheckIPPortConnect: ERROR: ${ipHost}: hostname not found or invalid IP
CheckIPPortConnect: ERROR: NULL input variable(s) detected: ${nullVariableList}

returnStep.name: No Action Taken : host not found
